name: Pratik Jawanpuria
content: Pratik Jawanpuria Skip to content I am an Associate Professor at the Centre for Machine Intelligence and Data Science (C-MInDS), IIT Bombay. My research interests lie in the areas of machine learning and optimization. Prior to this, I was in the Office India Intelligence team at Microsoft in Hyderabad.Â I have previously also worked in the India Machine Learning team at Amazon in Bengaluru. I completed my B.Tech in computer science from IIT Bombay in 2009. After a brief stint as a software engineer at Cisco, I returned to IIT Bombay as a grad student. I completed my Ph.D. under the supervision of Prof. J. Saketha Nath. I then worked as a postdoctoral researcher with Prof. Matthias Hein at Saarland University.
